NetworkPort.DiagnosticsReset.description: NOTE: Deprecated, will be removed in a future release. Replaced by HpeNetworkPort.DiagnosticsReset

description: The HpeNetworkPort resource describes the The HpeNetworkPort resource describes the Hewlett Packard Enterprise property extensions for Network Ports

dConfiguredNetworkLink.description: A link speed/lane width configuration this port is permitted to use for autonegotiation.

ConfiguredLinkSpeedGbps.description: The link speed per lane this port is configured to use for autonegotiation.

ConfiguredWidth.description: The number of lanes this port is configured to use for autonegotiation. If this property is omitted, the lane count shall default to one.

EvbReceiving.description: EVB TLV data received from the link partner on this port.

CdcpActive.description: True if a currently active IEEE 802.1Qbg CDCP TLV has been received from the link partner.

ChannelActive.description: A currently unexpired HPE Channel Link Control or HPE Channel Description TLV has been received from the link partner.

ChannelDescriptionLocalSequenceNumber.description: The link partner's HPE Channel Description sequence number that was last successfully received and processed.

ChannelDescriptionRemoteSequenceNumber.description: The last HPE Channel Decsription sequence number sent on this link that was successfully received and processed by the link partner.

ChannelDescriptionSubtype.description: The header subtype field of the last received HPE Channel Description TLV.

ChannelLinkControlLocalSequenceNumber.description: The link partner's HPE Channel Link Control sequence number that was last successfully received and processed.

ChannelLinkControlMCEnable.description: The Feature Indicators field, Management Controller (MC) Channel (SCID 4094) enabled state in the HPE CLC TLV being received from the link partner on this port.

ChannelLinkControlRemoteSequenceNumber.description: The last HPE Channel Link control sequence number sent on this link that was successfully received and processed by the link partner.

ChannelLinkControlSubtype.description: The header subtype field of the last received HPE Channel Link Control TLV.

Role.description: The link partner's IEEE 802.1Qbg operating role.

enumDescriptions.bridge: Indicates the link partner is operating as a Bridge.
enumDescriptions.station: Indicates the link partner is operating as a Station.

SChannelAssignments.description: The set of all EVB <SCID,SVID> S-Channel assignments received from the link partner on this port.

Scid.description: SCID value for this <SCID,SVID> S-Channel identifier pairreceived from the link partner on this port.

Svid.description: SVID assignment value for this <SCID,SVID> S-Channel identifier pair received from the link partner on this port. When 0 it indicates an assignment request is in progress.

SChannelMaxCount.description: Indicates the number of S-Channels the link partner can support on this physical link.

SChannelsSupported.description: When true this link supports S-Channels.

VirtualLinkStatusVector.description: A bit vector indicating S-Channel status received from the link partner, 1=up, 0=down. S-Channel status bits are ordered by SCID from lowest numbered (first) to highest (last).

EvbTransmitting.description: EVB TLV data being transmitted to the link partner on this port.

ChannelDescriptionData.description: The set of all S-Channel descriptions being transmitted to the link partner on this port.

items.description: Descriptive data for one S-Channel being transmitted to the link partner on this port.

Descriptor0BandwidthCirMbps.description: The bandwidth Commited Information Rate (CIR) for this S-Channel, in Mbps.

Descriptor0BandwidthPirMbps.description: The bandwidth Peak Information Rate (PIR) for this S-Channel, in Mbps.

Descriptor0ChannelTerminationType.description: Indicates the termination provided for this S-Channel.

enumDescriptions.NCSI-port: This S-Channel is mapped to the NCSI internal port for management.
enumDescriptions.SR-IOV-virtual: This S-Channel is presented to the host OS as a PCI SR-IOV virtual function.
enumDescriptions.primary-physical: This S-Channel is presented to the host OS as a primary PCI physical function.
enumDescriptions.secondary-physical: This S-Channel is presented to the host OS as a secondary PCI physical function, i.e. a PCI physical function behind a bridge on the device.
enumDescriptions.vSwitch-port: This S-Channel is mapped to a Virtual Switch port.

Descriptor0EthernetSupport.description: When true, this S-Channel supports Ethernet.

Descriptor0FCoESupport.description: When true, this S-Channel supports Fibre Channel over Ethernet (FCoE).

Descriptor0PcpSupport.description: Indicates which IEEE 802.1Q Ethernet Priority Code Point (PCP) classes are supported on this S-Channel. When no PCPs are supported, the S-Channel makes no attempt to filter or control traffic class. A string of 1/0 characters indicating 1=enabled, 0=disabled. PCP classes are ordered from highest numbered 7 (first) to lowest 0 (last).

Descriptor0RoCEESupport.description: When true, this S-Channel supports RDMA over Converged Enhanced Ethernet (RoCEE).

Descriptor0Scid.description: The S-Channel identifier for this Descriptor0 instance.

Descriptor0iSCSISupport.description: When true, this S-Channel supports Internet SCSI (iSCSI).

Descriptor1ConnectionID.description: A unique S-Channel identifer in UUID format.

Descriptor1Scid.description: The S-Channel identifier for this Descriptor1 instance.

ChannelDescriptionLocalSequenceNumber.description: This station's channel discovery local sequence number which will be transmitted to the link partner on this port.

ChannelDescriptionRemoteSequenceNumber.description: The link partner's channel discovery local sequence number that was last successfully received and processed.

ChannelDescriptorCount.description: The number of channel descriptor pairs being transmitted to the link partner on this port.

ChannelLinkControlLocalSequenceNumber.description: This station's channel link control local sequence number which will be transmitted to the link partner on this port.

ChannelLinkControlMCEnable.description: The Feature Indicators field, Management Controller (MC) Channel (SCID 4094) enabled state in the HPE CLC TLV being transmitted to the link partner on this port.

ChannelLinkControlRemoteSequenceNumber.description: The link partner's channel link control local sequence number that was last successfully received and processed.

Role.description: This port's IEEE 802.1Qbg role being advertised on the link.

enumDescriptions.bridge: Indicates this link is operating locally as a Bridge.
enumDescriptions.station: Indicates this link is operating locally as a Station.

SChannelAssignments.description: The set of all EVB <SCID,SVID> S-Channel assignments being transmitted to the link partner on this port.

Scid.description: SCID value for this <SCID,SVID> S-Channel identifier pair being transmitted to the link partner on this port.

Svid.description: SVID assignment value for this <SCID,SVID> S-Channel identifier pair being transmitted to the link partner on this port. When 0 it indicates an SVID assignment request to the link partner is in progress.

SChannelMaxCount.description: The Channel Capacity value being advertised to the link partner. It indicates the number of S-Channels this station can support on this physical link.

SChannelsSupported.description: When true, indicates that this physical link has S-Channel capability.

VirtualLinkStatusVector.description: A bit vector indicating S-Channel status being transmitted on this link, 1=up, 0=down. S-Channel status bits are ordered by SCID from lowest numbered (first) to highest (last).

enumDescriptions.agent-ID: Agent circuit ID, based on the agent-local identifier of the circuit as defined in RFC 3046.
enumDescriptions.chassisComp: Chassis component, based in the value of entPhysicalAlias in IETF RFC 4133.
enumDescriptions.ifAlias: Interface alias, based on the ifAlias MIB object.
enumDescriptions.ifName: Interface name, based on the ifName MIB object.
enumDescriptions.local-Assign: Locally assigned, based on a alpha-numeric value locally assigned.
enumDescriptions.mac-Addr: MAC address, based on an agent detected unicast source address as defined in IEEE Std. 802.
enumDescriptions.networkAddr: Network address, based on an agent detected network address.
enumDescriptions.portComp: Port component, based in the value of entPhysicalAlias in IETF RFC 4133.

LldpReceiving.description: LLDP data being received on this link.

ChassisID.description: The LLDP chassis ID received from the link partner.

ChassisIDSubtype.description: The IEEE 802.1AB-2009 chassis ID subtype received from the link partner.

Dcb.description: DCB data being received on thhis link.

ApplicationPriorityReceived.description: True when an unexpired Data Center Bridging (DCB) Application Priority Table TLV has been received.

ApplicationPriorityTable.description: The set of all entries in the DCB Application Priority Table, as received in the LLDP Application Priority TLV.

items.description: One entry in the DCB Application Priority Table, as received in the LLDP Application Priority TLV.

ApplicationPriority.description: Indicates which priority level is assigned for this application protocol.

ApplicationProtocol.description: An integer value indicating application protocol identity, of the type described by DCBApplicationSelect.

ApplicationSelect.description: Indentifies the type of the DCBApplicationProtocol property.

enumDescriptions.TCP-SCTP: DCBApplicationProtocol value is a well known port over TCP or SCTP.
enumDescriptions.TCP-SCTP-UDP-DCCP: DCBApplicationProtocol is a well known port over TCP, SCTP, SCTP, or DCCP.
enumDescriptions.UDP-DCCP: DCBApplicationProtocol value is a well known port over UDP or DCCP.
enumDescriptions.default-Ethertype: Default priority. Use when priority not otherwise specified.

Ets.description: ETS data being received on this link.

BandwidthAssignmentTable.description: The DCB ETS Traffic Class Assignment table received from the link partner. The sum of all bandwidth assignments in this table must be 100 or less

items.description: One entry in the DCB ETS Traffic Class (TC) Bandwidth Assignment Table.

CreditBasedShaper.description: True if the link partner supports the Credit-based Shaper (CBS) transmmission selection algortithm.

MaximumTrafficClassCount.description: The maximum number of traffic classes supported by the link partner.

PriorityAssignmentTable.description: The DCB ETS Priority Assignment Table from the received DCB ETS Configuration TLV.  Priority values are listed in order from 0 (first) to 7 (last).

items.description: One entry in the DCB ETS Priority Assignment Table indicating this priority's Traffic Class assignment.

TlvReceived.description: True when an unexpired DCB Enhanced Transmission Selection (ETS) TLV has been received.

TrafficSelectionAlgorithmTable.description: The DCB ETS TSA assignment table received from the link partner.  Traffic classes are listed from 0 (first) to 7 (last).

items.description: An assignment of a Traffic Selection Algorithm (TSA) to a traffic class.

enumDescriptions.vendor: Vendor specific algorithm for use with DCB.

Willing.description: True if the link partner is willing to accept ETS configurations.

LocalEqualRemote.description: True when the transmitted and received contents match for both DCB ETS and PFC TLVs.

Pfc.description: Priority flow control data being received on this link.

EnabledTrafficClasses.description: A bit string indicating which priority levels have PFC enabled, 1=enabled. PFC levels are bit ordered from 7 (first) to 0 (last).

MacSecurityBypassCapability.description: True when the link partner has the ability to bypass MAC security in order to improve PFC responsiveness.

MaximumTrafficClassCount.description: Indicates the maximum number of traffic classes that the link partner can simultaneously support.

TlvReceived.description: True when an unexpired DCB Priority Flow Control (PFC) TLV has been received.

Willing.description: True if the LLDP link partner is willing to accept PFC configurations.

Version.description: The DCB version supported by the link partner.

ManagementAddress.description: The management address received from the link partner.

ManagementAddressOID.description: An object identifier for the hardware or protocol entity associated with the management address.

ManagementAddressReceived.description: True when a currently unexpired management address TLV has been received from the link partner.

ManagementAddressType.description: The type of management address received from the link partner.

ManagementCvlanID.description: The management CVLAN ID received from the link partner.

enumDescriptions.ifIndex: Interface number is based on the ifIndex MIB object.
enumDescriptions.sysPortNum: Interface number is based on the system port numbering convention.

ManagementIFNumber.description: Management interface number received from the link partner represented as a colon delimited string of hexadecimal octets.

ManagementVlanReceived.description: True when a currently unexpired management address VID TLV has been received from the link partner.

NearestBridgeTtlExpired.description: True when the LLDP PDU most recently received from the link partner has expired.

PortDescription.description: The remote link partner's port description.

PortID.description: A colon delimited string of hexadecimal octets received from the link partner identifying its port.

PortIDSubtype.description: The port ID subtype enumeration from IEEE 802.1AB-2009 Table 8-3, which indicates the format for the PortID property.

SystemDescription.description: The system description received from the link partner.

LldpTransmitting.description: LLDP data being transmitted on this link.

ChassisID.description: The Link Layer Data Protocol (LLDP) chassis ID being transmitted on this link.

ChassisIDSubtype.description: The IEEE 802.1AB-2009 chassis ID subtype being transmitted on this link.

ManagementAddresses.description: The set of all management addresses being transmitted in LLDP on this link.

items.description: A management address for this server.

ManagementIPAddressType.description: The IANA type of this management address.

ManagementCvlanID.description: The management CVLAN ID being transmitted on this link.

ManagementCvlanIDTransmitted.description: When true, indicates that a management CVLAN ID is being transmitted on this link.

PortDescription.description: An alphanumeric string describing this link.

PortID.description: A colon delimited string of hexadecimal octets identifying this port.

PortIDSubtype.description: The port ID subtype from IEEE 802.1AB-2009 Table 8-3.

SystemDescription.description: A textual description of this system.

#NetworkPort.DiagnosticsReset.description: NOTE: Deprecated, will be removed in a future release. Replaced by HpeNetworkPort.DiagnosticsReset. Invoking this action will reset all diagnostic capabilities on this port to an inactive state.

#HpeNetworkPort.DiagnosticsReset.description: Invoking this action will reset all diagnostic capabilities on this port to an inactive state.

AutoNegotiationCapable.description: Indicates the ability of this network port to autonegotiate link speed.

ConfiguredNetworkLinks.description: The set of link speed and width pairs this port is configured to use for autonegotiation.

Evb.description: Edge Virtual Bridging (EVB) information for this port.

@odata.id.longDescription: NOTE: Deprecated, will be removed in a future release, replaced by EvbData. The unique resource identifier for EVB information on this port.  When null, the resource is not available.

EvbData.description: Edge Virtual Bridging (EVB) data for this network port.

Receiving.description: EVB TLV data received from the link partner on this port.

Transmitting.description: EVB TLV data being transmitted to the link partner on this port.

Lldp.description: Link-Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) information for this port.

@odata.id.longDescription: Note: Deprecated, to be removed in a future release, replaced by LldpData. The unique resource identifier for LLDP information on this port.  When null, the resource is not available.

LldpData.description: Link-Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) data for this network port.

Receiving.description: LLDP data being received on this link.

Transmitting.description: LLDP data being transmitted on this link.

PortDiagnosticEnableLocalLoopback.description: When true, local loopback is active on this port.  PortDiagnosticsEnabled must first be true in order to set this property to true.

PortDiagnosticEnableRemoteLoopback.description: When true, remote loopback is active on this port. PortDiagnosticsEnabled must first be true in order to set this property to true.

PortDiagnosticLocalLoopbackCapable.description: When true, the port has local loopback capability.

PortDiagnosticRemoteLoopbackCapable.description: When true, the port has remote loopback capability.

PortDiagnosticsEnabled.description: When true, diagnostic features are enabled on this port.

VirtualFunctionAllocations.description: Indicates the maximum number of virtual functions that may be allocated per logical device function on this port.

NetworkDeviceFunction.description: The logical network device function to which this virtual function allocation applies.

@odata.id.longDescription: A unique resource identifer for the network device function this allocation pertains to.  When null, the function assignment is not available.

VirtualFunctionsAllocated.description: The number of virtual functions allocated to this logical network device function instance.

title: #HpeNetworkPort.v1_3_0.HpeNetworkPort
